newsitem.title: GERMANY: Mannesmann Jan-May group sales up 16 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mannesmann Jan-May group sales up 16 pct.

text.p: Mannesmann AG said on Friday its group sales in the first five months of 1997 rose 16 percent to 14.3 billion marks ($8.3 billion), and that earnings in the period improved further.
The automotive, telecommunications, and pipes and trading divisions contributed to the improvement, the company said in a statement distributed at its annual general meeting.
Mannesmann said incoming orders in the five-month period rose 14 percent to 16.9 billion marks.
The engineering division remained in the red due to seasonal accounting swings.
But Mannesmann reaffirmed its forecast of further profit gains this year.
